comments.author: honzab.moz@firemni.cz
comments.raw_text: This is needed for notifying PreloaderBase when channels are switched during redirect.  There is a check in PreloaderBase that the start and stop notifications come from the right channel.  This check is needed when a preload is restarted with a new channel while the old channel has not delivered the stop notification so far to prevent logic break (prevent duplication of notifications and keep assumptions about the stop status inside PreloaderBase).
